Quickstart: Basic Registration
==============================

This tutorial provides a complete introduction to Twocan with a hands-on example of registering IF and IMC images.

**What you'll learn:**
- Basic Twocan workflow from data loading to registration
- How to set up Bayesian optimization with Optuna
- Understanding registration quality metrics
- Visualizing registration results

**Prerequisites:**
- Basic Python knowledge
- Familiarity with Jupyter notebooks
- Understanding of image registration concepts (helpful but not required)

**Data:**
This tutorial uses example IF and IMC data from the same tissue section.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   ../../notebooks/01_basic_registration.ipynb
